name: Stealth ASCII
description:
A traditional roguelike game. The game features ASCII art-based display, random-generated mazes and simple turn-based stealth gameplay. You play as a rogue (green @) collecting loot (yellow $) and avoiding guards (red G) and searching the exit to the next level (blue <). You have Stealth points which you will lose every time when you are too close to the guards. If you run out all Stealth points, you will lose. Collect lots of loot, avoid getting caught and replay!

CONTROLS:
W or Up Arrow: Move up
S or Down Arrow: Move down
A or Left Arrow: Move left
D or Right Arrow: Move right

TAP (touch-screen): Move
